com.team4153.systems

Class Chassis

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team4153.systems.Chassis
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Systems

    public class Chassis
extends Object
implements Systems
    Chassis subsystem for mecanum drive

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Chassis()
      The control mode needs to be set in the constructor for the speed mode to work: http://www.chiefdelphi.com/forums/showthread.php?t=89721 Setting the "changeControlMode" after the constructor does not seem to work.

        The command to drive mecanum via joystick and gyro angle
        Parameters:
        stick - The driver's joystick (usually via OI)
        heading - The gyro angle/heading
